title: Merchant services & payment technology powerhouse | North
text: North's comprehensive merchant services work harder for you From the front door to the back office and everything in between, North has you covered. We have everything you need to grow and scale your business, with North’s point of sale systems, payment processing, and merchant services. From the front door to the back office and everything in between, North has you covered. In-store, online, or on the go, nobody has more hard-working payment solutions. Diversified merchant services like invoicing, reporting, inventory, and reputation management. You deserve a merchant services provider who listens, understands, and evolves. At North, our proactive solutions are designed to grow with you as you and your business reach new heights. PCI DSS-validated with certified, point-to-point encryption and tokenization. Eliminate processing fees with the Edge Program.* Get paid sooner with same day or next day funding. Live support backed by extensive expertise. We offer payment processing and merchant solutions to accommodate almost every type of business. Cut integration time, increase product development. Through North Developer, merchants, ISVs, and VARs can plug in to a payment ecosystem to create full-featured payment solutions for: From credit card processing to back-office management, North points the way to smarter, faster, end-to-end payment solutions. It’s time to take your business to new heights.
